name: Karmic Justice! FTGD Game Jam 2021 - The Golden Rule
name_original: Karmic Justice! FTGD Game Jam 2021 - The Golden Rule
description:
Karmic Justice  - Full Time Game Dev Game Jam 2021 Submission

Theme : The Golden Rule (2-days) - The idea here is you are a judge that fights crime and hands out court rulings. However, the buffs you acquire are also handed to your enemies!

Controls - 

-Arrow keys to move

- Z = Attack

Description : Karmic Justice is a 2D beat-em-up where you are a judge that rules over convicted criminals. Judging criminals will provide you with stat changes, both good or bad. The catch is, all the stats changes you receive, the enemy will also receive.

Solo Developed

Purchased sound libraries utilized

Credits:

Song by : Kim Lightyear - https://opengameart.org/content/dino
